name: Arcane Legends (itch)
description:
Arcane Legend is a top-down, vertically scrolling shoot ‘em up set in a fantasy theme. Players
take on the role of a wizard, flying through several locations using the powers of fire, lightning,
water and wind, each with their own different effects, to take down enemies, who each have
their own resistances and weaknesses.
Over the course of their multi-stage journey, players will master the elements to save the world.
